# Caches
.cache
.npm/_cacache
.local/share/Trash
.local/share/baloo

# Build artifacts
node_modules
target
__pycache__
.venv
venv
.tox
.eggs
*.egg-info

# Large generated files
*.iso
*.qcow2
*.vmdk

# Synced elsewhere / can be re-downloaded
.local/share/Steam
.steam

# Git objects (can be re-fetched)
.git/objects

# IDE caches
.idea
.vscode-server

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.swp
*~
.DS_Store

# Browser caches
.config/chromium/Default/Service Worker
.config/chromium/Default/Cache
.config/google-chrome

# Electron app caches
.config/Code/CachedData
.config/Code/Cache
.config/Slack/Cache
.config/discord/Cache

# Package manager caches
.cargo/registry
.rustup/toolchains
.gradle/caches
.m2/repository

# Container/VM data
.local/share/containers
.local/share/libvirt
